Class StudentUI

StudentUI
public class StudentUI extends Object
User interface boundary class for Student

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    displayMenu()
    The main menu.
    private static void
    menu_DisplayMyEnquiries(Camp camp)
    Gets a list of Enquiry which current Student has made about a Camp Displays the list via DisplayHandler.displayResult(Enquiry) Allows Student to select more options via menu_ViewEnquiryOptions(Camp, Enquiry)
    private static void
    menu_DisplayOpenCamps(ArrayList<Camp> openCamps)
    Displays all Camps visible to Student and he/she fufils the criteria to SignUp Allows Student to select more options regarding a Camp via menu_ViewCampOptions(Camp)
    private static void
    menu_DisplayRegisteredCamps(ArrayList<Camp> registeredCamps)
    Displays a list of camps the Student has signed up for, as well as his/her role Role either as: Committee Member or Attendee Calls menu_ViewCampOptions(Camp) to display more options for a Camp
    private static void
    menu_SearchForCamp()
    Filters a camp by certain attributes and displays the search results through menu_DisplayOpenCamps(ArrayList) Attributes Camp name Camp start date Camp end date Camp faculty Camp location A certain Attendee A certain Committee member Calls SearchController methods for filtering
    private static void
    menu_ViewCampOptions(Camp camp)
    Displays more options for a Student to see more about a Camp Calls CampController.registerAttendee(Camp) to register as attendee Calls CampController.registerCommittee(Camp) to register as committee Calls EnquiryController.post(entity.Camp, java.lang.String) to add an enquiry to a Camp even without registering Calls menu_DisplayMyEnquiries(Camp) to let Student manage past Enquirys about this Camp
    private static void
    menu_ViewEnquiryOptions(Camp camp, Enquiry enquiry)
    Displays more options for an Enquiry For Student allows for edit and delete of Enquiry via EnquiryController.edit(Enquiry, String) and EnquiryController.delete(Camp, Enquiry) For CommitteeMember allows for reply of Enquiry via CommitteeUI.menu_ReplyEnquiry(Camp, Enquiry)
    private static void
    menu_WithdrawRegisteredCamps()
    Displays a list of Camps the Student has signed up for from CampController.getSignedUpCamps() Allows withdraw from a Camp only if he/she is not a committee member Calls CampController.removeAttendee(Camp) to perform withdrawl

    Methods inherited from class Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • StudentUI

      public StudentUI()

  • Method Details

    • displayMenu

      public static void displayMenu()
      The main menu. Only point of exit is through Logout

    • menu_DisplayOpenCamps

      private static void menu_DisplayOpenCamps(ArrayList<Camp> openCamps)
      Displays all Camps visible to Student and he/she fufils the criteria to SignUp
      Allows Student to select more options regarding a Camp via menu_ViewCampOptions(Camp)
      Parameters:
      openCamps -

    • menu_SearchForCamp

      private static void menu_SearchForCamp()
      Filters a camp by certain attributes and displays the search results through menu_DisplayOpenCamps(ArrayList)
      Attributes
      • Camp name
      • Camp start date
      • Camp end date
      • Camp faculty
      • Camp location
      • A certain Attendee
      • A certain Committee member
      Calls SearchController methods for filtering

    • menu_DisplayRegisteredCamps

      private static void menu_DisplayRegisteredCamps(ArrayList<Camp> registeredCamps)
      Displays a list of camps the Student has signed up for, as well as his/her role
      Role either as: Committee Member or Attendee
      Calls menu_ViewCampOptions(Camp) to display more options for a Camp
      Parameters:
      registeredCamps - an ArrayList

    • menu_WithdrawRegisteredCamps

      private static void menu_WithdrawRegisteredCamps()
      Displays a list of Camps the Student has signed up for from CampController.getSignedUpCamps()
      Allows withdraw from a Camp only if he/she is not a committee member
      Calls CampController.removeAttendee(Camp) to perform withdrawl

    • menu_ViewCampOptions

      private static void menu_ViewCampOptions(Camp camp)
      Displays more options for a Student to see more about a Camp
      Calls CampController.registerAttendee(Camp) to register as attendee
      Calls CampController.registerCommittee(Camp) to register as committee
      Calls EnquiryController.post(entity.Camp, java.lang.String) to add an enquiry to a Camp even without registering
      Calls menu_DisplayMyEnquiries(Camp) to let Student manage past Enquirys about this Camp

    • menu_DisplayMyEnquiries

      private static void menu_DisplayMyEnquiries(Camp camp)
      Gets a list of Enquiry which current Student has made about a Camp
      Displays the list via DisplayHandler.displayResult(Enquiry)
      Allows Student to select more options via menu_ViewEnquiryOptions(Camp, Enquiry)
      Parameters:
      camp -

    • menu_ViewEnquiryOptions

      private static void menu_ViewEnquiryOptions(Camp camp, Enquiry enquiry)
      Displays more options for an Enquiry For Student allows for edit and delete of Enquiry via EnquiryController.edit(Enquiry, String) and EnquiryController.delete(Camp, Enquiry) For CommitteeMember allows for reply of Enquiry via CommitteeUI.menu_ReplyEnquiry(Camp, Enquiry)
      Parameters:
      camp -
      enquiry -
